snippet: After 15 years as archbishop, Cardinal Bevilacqua saw his accomplishments tarnished by accusations that he covered up sexual abuse by priests.
abstract: Anthony J Bevilacqua, a former Roman Catholic cardinal and archbishop in Philadelphia, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: After 15 years as archbishop, Cardinal Bevilacqua saw his accomplishments tarnished by accusations that he covered up sexual abuse by priests.

headline.seo: Anthony J. Bevilacqua, Retired Cardinal in Philadelphia, Dies at 88
headline.main: Anthony J. Bevilacqua, Retired Cardinal of Philadelphia, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Anthony J. Bevilacqua, 88; Led Philadelphia Catholics
